page.title: 15JUVENILE JAZZ BAND
page.content: A Juvenile Jazz Band is a marching band for children between the ages of 5 and 18. These are the instruments that we have in our Jazz Band:maces,banner, shield, kazzoos, bass drum, side drums and cymbals.A Kazzoo is about 35cm long,and is shaped like a cone.It has a reed in it and that is what makes the sound when you play it. Sometimes,on a weekend,we go to carnivals to compete and try to win medals.We have practice on a Thursday from 6-8:30pm and sometimes on Tuesdays.The colour of our uniforms is brown and cream,and the people on the maces and the one on the bass drum have white and gold ones.There is a trainer,secretary,chairman, vice-chair man and treasurer.They form the committee.
